titleInfo.title: USA v. Espino
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER of Detention pending trial as to defendant Jeremy M. Espino. Ordered by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester. (LKH)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER of Detention pending trial as to defendant Jeremy M. Espino. Ordered by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester. (LKH)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Espino
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER that the defendant is sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of six (6) months in connection with the petition for offender under supervision 32; defendant shall receive credit for six weeks which he has served in custody following the filing of this petition; the second petition for offender under supervision 47 is dismissed; upon completion of the defendant's incarceration, he will be placed on supervised release for a period of 3 years, under the same terms and conditions of release previously imposed on April 7, 2004 as to as to defendant Jeremy M. Espino. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 certified copy to USM)(CJP)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER that the defendant is sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of six (6) months in connection with the petition for offender under supervision 32; defendant shall receive credit for six weeks which he has served in custody following the filing of this petition; the second petition for offender under supervision 47 is dismissed; upon completion of the defendant's incarceration, he will be placed on supervised release for a period of 3 years, under the same terms and conditions of release previously imposed on April 7, 2004 as to as to defendant Jeremy M. Espino. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 certified copy to USM)(CJP)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Espino
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - The defendant shall submit to a substance abuse evaluation and attend a domestic violence treatment program. The Final Disposition hearing is continued until September 9, 2011, at 9:00 a.m. as to defendant Jeremy M. Espino. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (TCL )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

titleInfo.title: USA v. Espino
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER regarding detention as to defendant Jeremy M. Espino. Defendant is currently in state custody in Adams County on related charges, and he shall be returned to the custody of Adams County. The Marshal shall place a detainer on the defendant to assure that upon defendant's release from the custody of Adams County, the defendant is immediately placed in the Marshal's custody. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER regarding detention as to defendant Jeremy M. Espino. Defendant is currently in state custody in Adams County on related charges, and he shall be returned to the custody of Adams County. The Marshal shall place a detainer on the defendant to assure that upon defendant's release from the custody of Adams County, the defendant is immediately placed in the Marshal's custody. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)
